name: The Red Crayon (YUHANG CHE)
description:
This is a horror adventure game based on one of the Japanese legend stories. The main theme behind it is domestic violence, especially child abuse. We would like to let more people be aware of it and stop any kinds of violence happening in families.

How to play: The player needs to find all the items to escape the house.

W,a,s,d - movement B - open/close the book(inventory) Mouse - collect items Esc - quit the game R - restart the game

Developer: Judy Mao

Art Direction: Ellie Zhu, Hana Che
